EV isolated method:
Cell culture medium was filtered through a 0.22 μm PVDF filter (Millipore, USA). We then collected exosomes using standard extraction methods as previously described [43]. The number and size of exosomes were examined by Electron Microscopy and quantified by NanoSight NS300 instrument (UK).
[43] Cell culture medium was filtered through a 0.22 μm PVDF filter (Millipore, USA). We then collected exosomes using standard extraction methods as previously described [43]. The number and size of exosomes were examined by Electron Microscopy and quantified by NanoSight NS300 instrument (UK).
Project_Title: Small RNA sequencing of the exosomes secreted from control and doxorubicin-induced senescent neutrophils
Project_Description: This study aims to explore the function of senescent neutrophils-derived exosomes in breast cancer development and chemoresistance.
